name: Brilliance
description:
HOW TO ASCEND

Leave your world behind and ascend.
Ships can only be damaged by bullets of the same color.
Ships only fire bullets of their current color.
Switch colors to deal and avoid damage accordingly.
Use spread shot to quickly wipe targets.

CONTROLS

A D to rotate
W to shoot
Q to spread shot
7 8 9 0 U I O to change colors
